name: Noir Nights(Demo)
description:
Made for 

Mini Jam 111: Colors²

The limitation was "You are your own enemy" So our team figured, why don't we make a game about a little girl battling her nightmares. 

In this game you must traverse bleak dreams in which the only slivers of colors are - you and your enemies. You have three types of ammo and the color of the enemy tells you which one you should use to defeat it.

This turned out to be quite a short experience, due to some unforeseen events(I also had to resort to using some of the stuff from my older projects, like music and pieces of code), however we plan to expand on the concept in the future: both gameplay and story-wise.

Our team consists of four people:

@veme, a programmer, who brought us all together

@solastica21, a wonderful artist, whose works didn't sadly get enough spotlight in this version

@FishFireTBoy, a great pixel artist

And myself, a composer, a pixel artist and a backup programmer
